articles.author: Antony Sguazzin and Janice Kew
articles.title: Johnson & Johnson in talks to run a vaccine booster trial in South Africa - News24
articles.description: Talks are under way with Johnson & Johnson about running a booster trial in South Africa after the company’s Covid-19 vaccine was used in a mass trial of almost half a million health workers in the country.
